context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_after.description: Limit response to posts modified after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_before.description: Limit response to posts modified before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

search_semantics.description: How to interpret the search input.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

search_columns.description: Array of column names to be searched.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

tax_relation.description: Limit result set based on relationship between multiple taxonomies.

menus.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the menus taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

operator.description: Whether items must be assigned all or any of the specified terms.

menus_exclude.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the menus taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

menu_order.description: Limit result set to posts with a specific menu_order value.

raw.description: Title for the object, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML title for the object, transformed for display.

type.description: The family of objects originally represented, such as "post_type" or "taxonomy".

status.description: A named status for the object.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

attr_title.description: Text for the title attribute of the link element for this menu item.

classes.description: Class names for the link element of this menu item.

description.description: The description of this menu item.

menu_order.description: The DB ID of the nav_menu_item that is this item's menu parent, if any, otherwise 0.

object.description: The type of object originally represented, such as "category", "post", or "attachment".

object_id.description: The database ID of the original object this menu item represents, for example the ID for posts or the term_id for categories.

target.description: The target attribute of the link element for this menu item.

url.description: The URL to which this menu item points.

xfn.description: The XFN relationship expressed in the link of this menu item.

menus.description: The terms assigned to the object in the nav_menu taxonomy.

force.description: Whether to bypass Trash and force deletion.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the autosave.
